title: Ranked 3s (Twisted Treeline)
body:
**(This may have been suggested already)**

Hey Peoples :)
I have seen many people talking about the Ranked 3s Twisted Treeline that was accidently added a few days ago, then permanently disabled.
People were asking it to be added 1 day a week, and many other people wanted it back for good.

I personally think it would be great for it to be added back into the game, instead of just playing the usual Summoners Rift / Howling Abyss.

Regards,

Katy Perry (OCE)

replies.body:
I think it would be cool if ranked TT was available at the same time as Blind TT, however the decision is based on server population. 
While they have enough for TT, having both may spread the population too thin, and out of both modes (ranked and blind) blind has to go first and it's not fair to force people into ranked or exclude pre30s.

I ain’t do nothin’. I don’t know what’s going on.
All I know is my side of the story.
I can’t tell no other story. I’m innocent.
And, mama I love you. POP. Holdin’ it down. [Right thez all good.] Pimp Squad baby, 4 LIFE.

I like riot, they are a cool company that made a great game.

But they are %%%%ing %%%%s about not giving us ranked TT, they could put it up for just one day per week.
Thanks for all the feedback c:
Where's the 3) What on earth is Twisted Treeline? O~O>

Twisted Treeline is a map in which players can verus 3v3. 
In this map they are;
-- 2 lanes, 
-- 2 towers a lane (4 in total), 
-- 2 Alters (by standing on the alter for a few seconds you can claim it, there are buffs depending if you have one or both) 
-- 7 neutral buffs; 6 in between the lanes, and a big spider above the upper lane. 

Queues are open on 3pm - 1 am (next day) Thursday, Friday and Saturday.
There's no meta in this map, although I believe all bruisers is quite viable if you have no other cool ideas.
